attributes.action: Declassify foxes as so- called "pests" in order to outlaw night shooting.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since the end of the first world war people started to live in rural areas -foxes already inhabiting the land had no other choice but to adapt. Surely it should be up to us as a nation of so - called "animal lovers" to ensure that we all get along.  Instead, we fail to remember that WE infiltrated THEIR environment and chose to resent them.  Recognising these beautiful creatures as "pests" only serves to encourage and justify the employment of fire arms.
